name: market for mango | mango | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19808/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'mango', in the geography of Brazil.;This is dataset represents the transport of 1 kg of mangoes from the production farm to the conditioning plant. No losses are considered in this dataset.;The product 'mango' is a fruit. It is a perennial crop.

The activity starts at the gate of mango production farm.

The activity ends with the provision of mangoes to the conditioning plant.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/012:Growing of perennial crops/0122:Growing of tropical and subtropical fruits

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The data are intended to reflect current equipment and processes on a Brazilian level.

exchanges.description: Mangoes are transported 15-20 km from the production site until the conditioning plant. The values come from expert judgement.
